tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE cryptocurrency_trading_data (
  trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  cryptocurrency_name VARCHAR(50),
  trade_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  trade_volume INT,
  trade_price DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE cryptocurrency_trade (
    trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    coin_name VARCHAR(50),
    trade_price DECIMAL(18, 2),
    trade_volume DECIMAL(18, 2),
    trade_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE exchange_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    exchange_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    base_currency VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    quote_currency VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    fees DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE trading_records (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  market_data_id INT NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  trade_type TEXT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(8, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE cryptocurrencies (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    symbol VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    volume DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE trades (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    cryptocurrency_id INT NOT NULL,
    exchange_id INT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL NOT NULL
);
